alert.note: Alert for Kimball (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 05 at 5:43PM CDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Kimball County through 515 PM MDT... At 443 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Panorama Point, or 24 miles southwest of Kimball, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Panorama Point. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
